short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this extension is to boost the productivity of InsuredMine agents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Email Tracking, CRM, and Sales Productivity with Gmail Integration

InsuredMine CRM seamlessly integrates with Gmail to help you discover more leads, engage efficiently, and close deals faster—all while keeping your contacts organized in one centralized database. Best of all, it’s free to start.

Note: A free InsuredMine account is required to use this extension.
